caption: Occurrence
description: The attributes that specify when the event occurred, duration, and aggregations.

end_time.description: The end time of a time period, or the time of the most recent event included in the aggregate event.

start_time.description: The start time of a time period, or the time of the least recent event included in the aggregate event.

end_time_window.description: The latest time in the detection search window.

start_time_window.description: The earliest time in the detection search window.
